include

include

include <bits/stdc++.h> ;

using namespace std;

long long unsigned memo[(1 << 20)]; long long unsigned n, x[20], y[20];

long long unsigned dist(int i, int j) { return abs(x[i] — x[j]) + abs(y[i] — y[j]); }

long long unsigned pairup(int mask) { if (mask == (1 << n) — 1) return 0; if (memo[mask] != 0) return memo[mask];

long long unsigned ans = 10000000000;
int p1, p2;

for (p1 = 0; p1 < n; p1++) {
    if (!(1 & (mask >> p1)))
       break;
}
for (p2 = p1 + 1; p2 < n; p2++) {
    if (!(1 & (mask >> p2))) {
       ans = min(ans, dist(p1, p2) + pairup(mask | (1 << p1) | (1 << p2)));
    }
}

return memo[mask] = ans;

}

int main() { freopen("ahmed.txt","r",stdin);

cin >> n;

    n *= 2;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
       scanf("%d %d", &x[i], &y[i]);
    }

    memset(memo, 0, sizeof(memo));
    long long unsigned ans = pairup(0);

cout << ans;


return 0;

}
